attributes.action: Harry Leslie Smith should be recommended by the House Of Commons for an honour
attributes.additional_details:
He is a living voice to remind the British people why can live the lives we do
Why we have the freedoms brought about by whose descendants make up multicultural Britain
attributes.background:
Harry Leslie Smith grew up in poverty in Yorkshire, and served in the RAF during the Second World War.
After retiring, Smith began writing his memoirs and about the social history of Great Britain, during his youth and in the 21st century

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
